description: Use every part of a cauliflower in this Moroccan-inspired vegetarian recipe.
name: MoroccanInspired Cauliflower Steaks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide cauliflower puree, steaks, reserved cauliflower leaves and chickpea mixture among plates. Spoon over currant dressing. Season and serve.
